dcFailure_badSocketType.message: An Unknown Socket error was encountered.

dcFailure_badSocketTypeLong.message: Unknown Socket error.  The site responded to the network request in an unexpected manner. This may be due to address (URL) using the wrong protocol for the specified port, or a non-standard configuration on the site which is running different services than expected.  (The specified socket type may not exist.)

dcFailure_badscriptdata.message: Script is missing event target data.  Data file may be corrupt.

dcFailure_badscripterror.message: Unable to process recorded script.  Data file may be corrupt.

dcFailure_bindingAborted.message: Network request canceled by browser or user settings.

dcFailure_bindingAbortedLong.message: The network request was canceled by the browser or by user settings.  This may occur when the browser cancels pending requests during URL location change, or if a resource is re-requested before the first one completes, or if the network request is skipped based on user settings.

dcFailure_bindingFailure.message: An unknown network request failure occurred.

dcFailure_bindingFailureLong.message: An unknown network request failure occurred.  The network request binding was aborted.

dcFailure_bindingRedirectedLong.message: The asynchronous request has been redirected to a different async request.  This error code is used with load groups to notify the load group observer when a request in the load group is redirected to another request.

dcFailure_bindingRetargetedLong.message: An asynchronous request was retargeted.  This error code is used with load groups to notify the load group observer when a request in the load group is removed from the load group and added to a different load group.

dcFailure_bookmarkreplay.message: Unable to replay the bookmarked script file.

dcFailure_cantexport.message: Unable to export the script file.

dcFailure_cantimport.message: Unable to import the script file.

dcFailure_connectionFail.message: Unable to connect to the specified site, even though it exists.

dcFailure_connectionFailLong.message: Connection failure error.  The browser was unable to connect to the specified site, even though it exists.  This may be because the site does not accept connections from your computer, the service may be down, or the site does not support the service or port that you tried to connect to.

dcFailure_connecttimeout.message: Timeout interval reached while waiting for a network connection.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_dnsNotFound.message: The address was not found or there was a DNS lookup error.

dcFailure_dnsNotFoundLong.message: The address (URL) does not correspond to a known site and could not be loaded.  This could be due to a misspelling in the address or because the site does not exist. If the address is known to be valid, or if the problem occurs for many sites, it may be an issue with your proxy service (if you use one) or the directory name service lookup.

dcFailure_errorKeywordCustomError.message: A keyword was detected that indicates the monitored site is in a maintenance state.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_errorKeywordCustomErrorLong.message: A keyword [$1] was detected that indicates the monitored site is in maintenance state.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_errorkeyword.message: An error keyword validation item was found.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_errorkeywordLong.message: An error keyword validation item was found [$1].  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_eventtimeout.message: Timeout interval reached waiting for the page to load.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_fileNotFound.message: The file specified by the address (URL) cannot be found.

dcFailure_fileNotFoundLong.message: File Not Found error.  Check that the file exists and that you have sufficient permissions to view it.

dcFailure_genericFailure.message: The page could not be loaded, possibly because it does not exist or the location is incorrect.

dcFailure_genericFailureLong.message: The page could not be loaded, possibly because it does not exist or the location is incorrect.  Check that the address (URL) is valid and correctly formatted.

dcFailure_httpError.message: The server responded with an HTTP error ($1)

dcFailure_httpErrorLong.message:
Server returned HTTP error:  $1
  Requested URL:  $2
  Was Successful: $3
  Response Code:  $4
  Response Text:  $5

dcFailure_internalerror.message: An unexpected exception has occurred.  The previous action was cancelled.

dcFailure_javascriptTimeout.message: A Javascript validation operation timed out.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_javascriptTimeoutLong.message: Javascript validation of [$javascript$] timed out.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_keywordTimeout.message: A keyword validation operation timed out.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_keywordTimeoutLong.message: Keyword validation of [$keyword$] timed out.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_locationtimeout.message: Timeout interval reached waiting for an expected URL location change event.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_malformedURI.message: The address (URL) is not a valid format and cannot be read.

dcFailure_malformedURILong.message: Invalid URL address format.  A common cause for the problem is using backslashes(\) instead of forward slashes (/).

dcFailure_maxskipped.message: The number of skipped events has exceeded the maximum configured limit.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_maxsteps.message: The maximum number of transaction steps was exceeded for your billing plan.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_minScriptVersion.message:
This script is not compatible with your installed version of DejaClick.
Please update.  Import aborted.

dcFailure_missingFeatures.message:
This script is not compatible with your installed version of DejaClick.
Some required features are not available.  Import aborted.

dcFailure_mutbegintimeout.message: Timeout interval reached while waiting for page content changes to begin.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_mutendtimeout.message: Timeout interval reached while waiting for page content changes to complete.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_navigationtimeout.message: Timeout interval reached waiting for an expected page navigation event.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_negAssertion.message: A JavaScript validation failed (returned true). Replay stopped.

dcFailure_negAssertionLong.message: A JavaScript validation failed (returned $2 => true) [JavaScript text: $1]. Replay stopped.

dcFailure_netInterruptLong.message: The network transfer was interrupted.  The connection was established, but the data transfer was interrupted.

dcFailure_netOffline.message: The browser is currently offline and cannot connect to the requested site.

dcFailure_netOfflineLong.message: Network offline error.  Document falied to load because the browser is offline and the cache does not contain a copy of the document.

dcFailure_netReset.message: The resource failed to load because of a server or network reset issue.

dcFailure_netResetLong.message: Network reset error.  The link to the site was dropped unexpectedly while negotiating a connection or transferring data. This may be due to a network fault somewhere between the site and your computer.  This means the connection was established, but no data was ever received, so the document failed to load because the server kept reseting the connection before data could be read from it.

dcFailure_netTimeout.message: A timeout occurred while communicating with the specified site.

dcFailure_netTimeoutLong.message: A timeout occurred while communicating with the specified site.  The site may be experiencing high loads that are slowing it down, or network problems are preventing data from being received from it in a timely manner.

dcFailure_networktimeout.message: Timeout interval reached waiting for expected network content.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_objectfailure.message: Page object timeout or failure occurred.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_populateScriptVar.message: Error populating value of script variable.

dcFailure_posAssertion.message: A JavaScript validation failed (returned false).   Replay stopped.

dcFailure_posAssertionLong.message: A JavaScript validation failed (returned $2 => false) [JavaScript text: $1]. Replay stopped.

dcFailure_protocolNotFound.message: An Unknown Protocol error was encountered.

dcFailure_protocolNotFoundLong.message: The address (URL) starts with a protocol that is not recognized by the browser.  A protocol is the part at the front of the address, such as http: or ftp: which tells the browser how to connect to the site.

dcFailure_redirectLoop.message: A fatal redirect loop was encountered.

dcFailure_redirectLoopLong.message: Redirection limit for this URL exceeded. Unable to load the requested page because the site is redirecting requests to itself in a manner which prevents it from ever completing.  This may be caused by cookies that are blocked.

dcFailure_requiredKeywordCustomError.message: A keyword was not detected that indicates the monitored site is in a maintenance state.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_requiredKeywordCustomErrorLong.message: A keyword [$1] was not detected that indicates the monitored site is in maintenance state.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_requiredkeyword.message: A required keyword validation item was not found.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_requiredkeywordLong.message: A required keyword validation item was not found [$1].  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_responsetimeout.message: Timeout interval reached waiting for a response to a replayed browser event.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_steptimeout.message: Fullpage document step timeout occurred.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_targetmatchscore.message: The minimum configured target match score was not met.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_targetnotfound.message: The expected page content differs too significantly for replay to continue.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_targetnotfoundLong.message: The target of the replayed event was not found, perhaps due to significant page content or navigation changes.  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_txntimeout.message: Transaction timeout occurred (max replay time limit reached).  Replay stopped.

dcFailure_unexpectedDialog.message: A prompt or dialog was encountered for which there were no instructions found for properly handling it.  View event properties to edit dialog instructions or re-record the script.

dcFailure_unexpectedDialogLong.message: Missing dialog prompt instruction for [$1].  Replay stopped.

dcMessage_appendComplete.message: Recording complete!  ($1 new events successfully appended)

dcMessage_appendIncomplete.message: No new events recorded, nothing to append.

dcMessage_captureUploadReject.message:
Scripts with diagnostic screen capture properties enabled cannot be uploaded.
Please adjust screen capture property settings.

dcMessage_captureUploadWarn.message:
This script has diagnostic screen capture properties enabled.
Are you sure you want to upload?

dcMessage_classicModeAlreadyOpen.message: DejaClick in classic record mode already opened. Please use conventional mode or close DejaClick Side bar a create a new monitor again.!

dcMessage_deleteWarning.message: You are inserting a new action. Existing events occurring after the insertion point for this action will be deleted

dcMessage_encryptedScriptNotSupported.message: Encrypted scripts not supported on this mode. Press OK to upload script without encryption.

dcMessage_insertWarning.message: All user interaction will be inserted from this point

dcMessage_noActionStatus.message: This action has no replay status.

dcMessage_noEventStatus.message: This event has no replay status.

dcMessage_noScriptStatus.message: This script has no replay status.

dcMessage_noSubscriptStatus.message: This branch has no replay status.

dcMessage_recordIncomplete.message: No events recorded, nothing to replay.

dcMessage_replayCompleteNoStep.message:

dcMessage_replayCompleteSkip.message: Playback complete!  ($1 events successfully replayed, $2 events skipped)

dcMessage_replayTerminated2.message: Replay will be terminated at the end of this event.

dcMessage_tooLargeUpload.message: The script is too large.  Upload aborted.

dcMessage_tooLargeUploadLong.message: Scripts larger than 10MB cannot be uploaded to AlertSite's global monitoring platform.  Upload aborted.

dcMessage_unverifiedScript.message:
Unverified scripts cannot be uploaded.
Please replay the current recording to verify its status.

dcMessage_warnKeywordsUpload.message:
This recording contains no keyword validations.

Keywords can help detect page content errors and are recommended for monitored scripts.  You may add keywords during replay when the Play button is set to 'Replay Next Action'.  The Keyword toolbar button will be activated following each replayed Action to enable keyword selection mode.  Pressing Play during keyword selection mode will advance to the next Action.

Continue with upload?

dcMessage_warnUnverifiedUpload.message:
This script has not been successfully replayed.
Continue with upload?

dcMessage_warnadvisorchanges.message: The Replay Advisor has automatically adjusted your recording to correct issues encountered during playback.  Please replay your recording again by using the Play button on the toolbar to verify these changes, then re-save the recording using the Save toolbar button if you would like the changes to be permanent.

dcService_DSInc.message: incrementing row by $1 and column by $2

Any Navigation events generated by this embedded object will be

deja_properties_contentChangesDescriptio.message: Special hints are recorded whenever a visited page alters its contents after it has been loaded into the browser.  During replay, these hints help determine if the expected content changes have occurred before beginning the next event, and which dynamic content needs to be reconstructed if triggered by mouse movements.  These actions are normally handled automatically; however, at times it may be necessary to manually adjust these settings.

deja_properties_flashOptionsHideDescript.message: You may visibly hide Flash content to speed execution time if Flash interaction is not required.  This can help Flash objects behave reasonably well by eliminating their constant frame rendering which consumes the most CPU execution time.

deja_properties_flashOptionsWmodeDescrip.message: You may override the WMODE attribute of Flash objects for special circumstances.  If the WMODE value is missing or set to 'window', Chrome is unable to hear click events on the object.

These actions are normally handled automatically; however, at times it may be necessary to manually adjust these settings.

deja_properties_newVisitorDescription.message: Websites may change their displayed content or functionality after repeat visits, which can sometimes create issues during replay.  The following option will adjust browser settings during record and replay to simulate visiting a website for the first time.

deja_properties_newVisitorHideCookiesTit.message: Temporarily remove existing cookies while recording and replaying.

deja_properties_pauseIntervalsDescriptio.message: Your pause intervals (user think time) from the original recording may be used during replay.

deja_properties_replayAdvisorDescription.message: Replay Advisor can prompt for your assistance when certain types of record or replay issues occur.  In many cases, it may also be possible for Replay Advisor to automatically correct these issues.

deja_properties_replayAdvisorRepair.message: Let Replay Advisor make script adjustments

deja_properties_replayTimingsDescription.message: The following internal timings are used during replay and normally should not require adjustment.

deja_properties_urlMasksDescription.message: Exclude specific URLs from being processed.

deja_properties_variableOptionsCounterDe.message: Script variables may include Auto-Increment tokens.  The increment applied is based upon the number of times the current script was replayed during power on.  Your current script's replay count may be adjusted below for testing purposes.

deja_properties_variableOptionsLocationD.message: Script variables may include tokens that are limited to specific monitoring Location IDs.   This allows the same variable to render differently based on where the script is run.  By default, your computer is identified as Location ID 0.  You may temporarily adjust this value to simulate replay at a specific monitoring location for testing purposes.

deja_properties_variablesDescription.message: You may add script variables to substitute dynamic vaues for event input

deja_properties_warnremotecrypto.message: An encryption password may be required when uploading or downloading transactions from AlertSite if this feature is enabled.  Customer Support may also be limited for encrypted transactions unless a valid password is provided.

deja_restapi_error51.message:
AlertSite's transaction monitoring service has been upgraded and now requires a newer version of the recorder than you currently are using.
Please download the latest recorder from http://www.alertsite.com/ASTM.  Don't forget to uninstall the old version and reinstall the new.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

deja_restapi_error52.message:
AlertSite's transaction monitoring service has been upgraded and now requires a newer version of the DéjàClick extension than you currently are using.
Please download the latest version from http://www.alertsite.com/dejaclick.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

deja_sidebar_freeTrialItemHint.message: Sign Up Online - Try AlertSite FREE for 30 days

deja_sidebar_jsHelpHint.message:
You are now in "document selection" mode.

Click anywhere in a frame or window to select it as the evaluation document for a JavaScript validation.

To exit this mode and resume record/replay, close the Validation toolbar either by clicking the Close [x] icon on the Validation toolbar or by clicking on the Validation icon on the main DejaClick toolbar again.

deja_sidebar_jsSuggestLabel.message: Click in any frame or window to select the target document for a Javascript validation

deja_sidebar_jsValidationItemHint.message: Open the Javascript Validation toolbar to add validations to this page

deja_sidebar_keywordHelpHint.message:
You are now in "keyword selection" mode.

Move your mouse around the page to see how the keyword dropdown will automatically suggest keywords or phrases to validate the page during replay.  Click on any suggested text item to create a new keyword validation, or select a range of text to have the page source for your selection used instead.

Open the keyword dropdown to display a list of all keywords created for the page.  You can select any keyword in the dropdown to edit or remove it.  You can also create keywords by typing the word or phrase directly into the keyword dropdown and pressing Enter.

To add a keyword with default options and without showing the Add Keyword Validation dialog, hold down the Ctrl key while clicking on a suggested keyword or while pressing Enter after typing a keyword into the dropdown.

To exit this mode and resume record/replay, close the Validation toolbar either by clicking the Close [x] icon on the Validation toolbar or by clicking on the Validation icon on the main DéjàClick toolbar again.

deja_sidebar_keywordSuggestLabel.message: Click on a word or phrase on the page to use it as a keyword:

deja_sidebar_localCryptCancelled.message:
Encryption cancelled.  Script was not saved.

Local script encryption can be enabled or disabled from the Configure Options toolbar menu.  You can also adjust other encryption settings from the Security tab of the DejaClick Options dialog, accessible from the Configure Options toolbar menu.
